nodes.text: I7-S7 was an Astromech droid of the Sith Empire active in the aftermath of the war against Zakuul. In 3630 BBY it was brougth to Iokath to provide assistance during the the War on Iokath.
I7-S7 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a vendor on Iokath for Imperial-affiliated players.
